name: Cat Quest (itch) (sncan)
description:
Help! Mango the Momma Cat lost her kittens! They're out there somewhere with all the dangerous animals :((

Help Mango by rescuing her kittens and fending off the vicious lions and beasts!

Press space to release a blast of yarn balls to stun the attackers
